[suppressNullAsDelete?](./ts-res.runtime.iresourceresolveroptions.suppressnullasdelete.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Controls whether null values in resource composition should suppress properties instead of setting them to null. When true, properties with null values from higher-priority partial candidates will be omitted from the final composed resource.


</td></tr>
